scripts.build: git add -A && (git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m 'Auto-commit before version bump [skip ci]') && npm version patch -m 'Bump version to %s [skip ci]' && webpack --mode production
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --latest --title "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" --notes "Automated release"
